actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to deny electric and gas utilities a deduction for amounts paid or incurred by such utilities to advertise or promote the sale or use of electricity or gas.

summary.text: Denies electric and gas public utilities a deduction under the Internal Revenue Code for amounts paid or incurred by such utilities to advertise or promote the sale or use of electricity or gas.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to deny electric and gas utilities a deduction for amounts paid or incurred by such utilities to advertise or promote the sale or use of electricity or gas.
